topmarks fonts a typeface family for infant learning

About Topmarks Fonts

The Topmarks fonts are a Free Software typeface family being developed in response to teachers and educators who find a lack of fonts suitable for use in infant learning. The aim of developing the Topmarks fonts is to widen the choice of suitable typefaces available for use in teaching resources such as worksheets and interactive whiteboard resources.

Specimens of the Topmarks Fonts are here.

Free Software

The Topmarks fonts are released under the Open Font License. This license allows the fonts to be used freely, by an unlimited numbers of users, for all sorts of uses. The Topmarks fonts can be used for printing, as webfonts, for setting digital documents, embedding in other software, used in commercial or non-commercial works. Also, being Free Software, the Topmarks fonts can be shared, given away, or even altered.

Getting and Using the Topmarks Fonts

First versions of the Topmarks fonts are freely available. Download them from the links below. The fonts are in both OpenType and TrueType formats. There is also a webfont kit available for using the Topmarks fonts in web pages.

  • Topmarks Fonts
  • Topmarks Webfont Kit

    • Topmarks Regular & Bold

    About the design of Topmarks Fonts

    The design of Topmarks fonts is based on the Free Software font 'Muli'.

    Muli has already proved a useful font in classrooms, as it is a simple and very legible design, so it was a good starting point for Topmarks. The underlying basic structure of Topmarks and Muli are the same, so they also make good companions when used together.

    Topmarks is being developed in various weights and versions to suit the different needs found in children's learning.

    If you have some specific ideas for the development of Topmarks Fonts, or would like to report bugs or problems with the fonts, please send an email.

    Roadmap & Funding

    The Topmarks Fonts have been steadily under development for nearly 12 months. It is now planned to raise development funding via indiegogo so that the fonts can be developed further, and completed in a more concentrated effort.

    If you want to add to Topmarks' funding, please visit the Topmarks Fonts indiegogo site.
